title: Mare
body:
<<Mare>>
Well, well, well… Another Guardian of Dreams comes to the rescue… Ready to face your crushing defeat?
<<Tala>>
Mare! The Mistress of Darkness, the one who causes all this chaos, set our Master free!
<<Mare>>
Do you even think I’ll follow you? I’ll give you a chance to go away and live your life.
<<Tala>>
I’ll never turn my back!
<<Mare>>
This Kingdom, this realm is MINE!!!
